entry.data:
CLOUDY WITH SHOWERS THIS EVENING, THEN PARTLY CLOUDY AFTER MIDNIGHT
LOWS IN THE LOWER 40S
NORTH WINDS 10 TO 15 MPH
CHANCE OF RAIN 90 PERCENT

SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE UPPER 50S
NORTHWEST WINDS 10 TO 15 MPH

MOSTLY CLEAR
LOWS IN THE UPPER 30S
WEST WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH

SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 60S
WEST WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH

PARTLY CLOUDY IN THE EVENING, THEN BECOMING MOSTLY CLOUDY
LOWS IN THE UPPER 30S
WEST WINDS AROUND 5 MPH

PARTLY SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE MID 50S

MOSTLY CLOUDY IN THE EVENING, THEN BECOMING PARTLY CLOUDY
LOWS IN THE MID 30S

PATCHY FROST IN THE MORNING
MOSTLY SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE UPPER 50S

MOSTLY CLEAR
LOWS IN THE LOWER 40S
HIGHS IN THE UPPER 60S
